data.name: Castillo y Toledo entrada
data.desc: Captain Juan del Castillo y Toledo charged with punishing guilty parties in Paliac murders, but Capt Castillo y Toledo rather focusses efforts on reducing Ma just north of Hondo R
data.locn: Oxkutzcab, Holpat, Chanchanha [Sacalum?], Ixpimienta or Tzucpimienta
data.agents_sp: Gov Bruno Tello y Guzmán, Capt Juan del Castillo y Toledo, Capt Juan Castillo del Arrúe, Fr Francisco Centurion, Fr Sebastian Méndez 129 Sp 141 Ma
data.prim_n: MEXICO,924 [Méritos y servicios de Juan del Castillo y Toledo y Juan Castillo del Arrúe a 1717]
data.note: Holpat = 130 leagues [S or SE] fm Oxkutzcab /v Jones 252
